Class ArffDataset

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pikater.web.visualisation.implementation.datasource.ArffDataset
  • Direct Known Subclasses:

    public abstract class ArffDataset
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class implementing some functions for accessing the dataset

    siposp

        public boolean next()
             throws java.io.IOException
        Tries to read a not yet attended item from the dataset.
        Returns:

        Throws:

      • getAxis

        public Axis getAxis(int attrIndex)

        Creates the appropriate axis for the dataset's attribute.

        Type of the returned axis depends on the attribute's type in the following way:

        • if the attribute contains nominal data (several categories) then CategoricalAxis is returned
        • if the attribute contains other than nominal data (most probably real numbers) then ValueAxis is returned.

        Parameters:
        attrIndex - index of attribute for which the axis is created
        Returns:
        the created axis

      • getColorer

        public Colorer getColorer(int attrIndex)

        Creates the appropriate colorer for the dataset's attribute. This colorer is used to generate the proper color of the point representing the data entry.

        Type of the returned colorer depends on the attribute's type in the following way:

        • if the attribute contains nominal data (several categories) then CategoricalColorer is returned
        • if the attribute contains other than nominal data (most probably real numbers) the LinearColorer is returned

        Parameters:
        attrIndex - index of attribute for which the colorer is created
        Returns:
        the created colorer

      • getNumberOfInstances

        public int getNumberOfInstances()
        Returns the number of data entries in the file
        Returns:
        number of data entries

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Closes the stream used for accessing the dataset file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
